entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
